Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its importance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $12,000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a price that is higher than what you perceive its worth but still below my acquisition cost. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow us to collaborate on this exciting venture. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
